Author: fishfishfish313
Title: [ANN] Billionaire Token - Games on the Blockchain! 🔥 Deflationary Algorithm
Body: I read through the whitepaper . . . and I'm intrigued.       This is on point.  Many coins have enormous premines and hundreds of millions of coins, many with no real use case at all, except for maybe MN's.  No innovation.  From what I'm reading, it is the aim of XBL to create the opposite economic model?  A deflationary one?    I am not a dev, but the function of the smart contracts is laid out very well.  I like that it is on the Etheruem network, and all functions are transparent and can be checked for consistency at any time.     Users must first call the approve() function on the XBL token address (0x49aec0752e68d0282db544c677f6ba407ba17ed7) with the Burner address as a parameter – allowing the Burner to spend coins on their behalf. After this, they will call the registerBurn() function on the Burner Smart Contract address, the parameter to this function being the amount of coins they have previously “approved” the Burner to spend on their behalf.  If there aren't enough tokens in the Burner address, the coins won't be burned?  I'm assuming that this acts as a sort of failsafe?  Will the Burner address ever run out of tokens?    The reasons for the different functions are pretty clear.  For someone who may not understand how to "call functions" are there plans to create a guide or tutorial for people who are less tech inclined to participate?  I think that the gambling aspects of the coin sound great, but to get the "total effect" of XBL, it sounds like people should also know how to call smart contracts on the Etheruem network.  I think that a guide or something similar, would help people to get the most bang for their buck out of the token. Are all these smart contracts able to be used through something like MyEtherWallet?  I would assume so, but figured I'd ask, in case anyone else is wondering.   In order to do this, the Billionaire Hold’em open source poker game will ask an Ethereum Smart contract to generate a number. This number will be available for everyone to see after the game ends and will be used to seed the random number generator from inside the Poker Game. Because this data can be sniffed via the network, the Billionaire Hold’em poker game application will generate another number, that will be joined with the first one generated by the Smart Contract with the help of an algorithm. This algorithm and second number will also be public knowledge. This is to ensure that any Billionaire Token poker game can be auditable.  Good.  It is imperative for a successful gambling token to be provably fair.

Author: Kishan748
Title: [ANN] Billionaire Token - Games on the Blockchain! 🔥 Deflationary Algorithm
Body: Most percentages of the ico are coming in gambling industry Hope this is competitive enough to stay in the market for so long

Author: gluedog
Title: [ANN] Billionaire Token - Games on the Blockchain! 🔥 Deflationary Algorithm
Body: Hi, no. XBL will be available for buying only with BTC, LTC, and ETH.  Quote from: fishfishfish313 on August 14, 2017, 03:36:11 AM I read through the whitepaper . . . and I'm intrigued.    Quote Users must first call the approve() function on the XBL token address (0x49aec0752e68d0282db544c677f6ba407ba17ed7) with the Burner address as a parameter – allowing the Burner to spend coins on their behalf. After this, they will call the registerBurn() function on the Burner Smart Contract address, the parameter to this function being the amount of coins they have previously “approved” the Burner to spend on their behalf.  If there aren't enough tokens in the Burner address, the coins won't be burned?  I'm assuming that this acts as a sort of failsafe?  Will the Burner address ever run out of tokens?    The reasons for the different functions are pretty clear.  For someone who may not understand how to "call functions" are there plans to create a guide or tutorial for people who are less tech inclined to participate?  I think that the gambling aspects of the coin sound great, but to get the "total effect" of XBL, it sounds like people should also know how to call smart contracts on the Etheruem network.  I think that a guide or something similar, would help people to get the most bang for their buck out of the token. Are all these smart contracts able to be used through something like MyEtherWallet?  I would assume so, but figured I'd ask, in case anyone else is wondering.   Glad you liked the whitepaper fish  It says later on in there that if the Burner smart contract does not have enough funds to send the reward, it will throw an exception and not actually burn any coins from the user. So there's not a risk of burning coins and not receiving rewards.  Yes it is possible for the burner to run out of coins of course, imagine if everybody was using it, the burner would run out of coins pretty fast.  But then, also imagine this: the people that had used the burner and gotten their rewards will just go ahead and play the raffle again with the profits that they made (they're profits right? why not reinvest them) - helping to perpetuate the deflation of Billionaire token.  Quote from: Kishan748 on August 14, 2017, 08:17:43 AM Most percentages of the ico are coming in gambling industry Hope this is competitive enough to stay in the market for so long  I believe XBL WILL be competitive, just because the deflation mechanism is something that no other "gambling" coin has. It's a little extra, something to differentiate us from the competition.

Author: gluedog
Title: [ANN] Billionaire Token - Games on the Blockchain! 🔥 Deflationary Algorithm
Body: We will actually be seeding our random number generator (from the poker game) via an Ethereum Smart Contract - The seed will become public knowledge once the game is over. Since this seed can be sniffed (and thus people will be able to cheat at the poker game) we will combine this with an internally-generated number, one that will also be made public once the game is over.  This will make the "Billionaire Hold'em" poker game 100% fair and auditable.

Author: gluedog
Title: [ANN] Billionaire Token - Games on the Blockchain! 🔥 Deflationary Algorithm
Body: Quote from: mt55 on August 07, 2017, 08:54:25 AM    Slimcoin uses it for example.  https://github.com/slimcoin-project/Slimcoin/wiki/The-magic-of-Proof-of-Burn  Yeah, not the same thing, though. Slimcoin is not an ethereum token. Our mechanism is not called "proof of burn", although there exist certain similarities.  Nobody has made a low supply, highly deflationary, gambling-oriented ethereum token before. We are the first ones to do so.  There are other gambling tokens, sure. There are other deflationary coins, sure.  But there are no other highly deflationary, gambling oriented coins - with a kick-ass marketing campaign on top. We strongly believe the combination of these two factors will give the coin great value in the times to come.  I would suggest you wait a bit until the Whitepaper is released. After reading it, we think that many of you will better understand why you should choose Billionaire Token.

Author: gluedog
Title: [ANN] Billionaire Token - Games on the Blockchain! 🔥 Deflationary Algorithm
Body: Hello guys,  Just a quick update:  People have recently voiced concern over the raffle and the coin-burning mechanism, specifically that the raffle is not rewarding enough and that after the Bounty Campaign finishes (where we reward people for burning their own coins) people will not have as much incentive to perpetuate this deflationary mechanism that is embedded into the core of Billionaire Token.  We love to hear feedback from the community and will constantly be changing in order to make the project more attractive keep the investors happy, and as such we have decided to change the following aspects:  1. The "Become a Billionaire" raffle will be changed to include having three winners. This will give people more incentive to play the raffle, will make it more rewarding overall, and will help perpetuate the deflationary mechanism.  2. We will implement a Smart Contract that works together with the raffle and will reward people for burning their own coins.   Our goal, after our poker game is released, is to reach 1$ per XBL token. If the maximum supply is not larger than 1 mil, we would only need 1 mil market cap to achieve this.  The feedback has been so far mostly positive and constructive criticism.  RECAP (TL;DR)  Because of this community feedback we have so far decided to change the following aspects of the coin:  - The token distribution model will be made more fair to all participants, while still rewarding early investors as they are the ones taking the biggest risk. - The raffle will be changed to include three winners instead of just one. - There will be another Smart Contract created that will work together with the raffle, and will reward people for burning their own coins - just another incentive for the deflationary model to work its magic.  Stay tuned for the upcoming updates:  - The Whitepaper is scheduled to be released this week. - We will have a guide over at the bounty section of the forum on how to burn your own coins, so if you have some coins already then you should really look into this because you will receive 25% back. This bounty will be available during the first part of the ICO, so people who invest early can actually make a lot more XBL tokens (provided there is enough in the bounty account).

Author: gluedog
Title: [ANN] Billionaire Token - Games on the Blockchain! 🔥 Deflationary Algorithm
Body: Hey Sowik,  We did have an ICO price in mind, but because of community feedback we have decided to re-work the distribution model from scratch.  As of right now, there is no price set for the ICO, we're still debating over what the price and the bonuses should be. Have no fear, though, as we are specifically looking for a Token Sale setup that is most fair to all participants.  Our goal is to have the exchange prices never go below ICO price and we hope to achieve this by:  1. Setting a lower price than we originally had in mind. 2. Setting longer bonuses for everyone: In the old distribution model (the one we decided to change) we had an initial 5 hour window with a 75% bonus, after that the bonus would not get any higher than 35%. We felt that this would be unfair for the Billionaire Token buyers that did not have the chance to get in that initial, 5 hour window to get the cheapest available price. 3. Burning the tokens that are left in the Bounty Account (0x23EA016b4EBA78dFC374E99b2F6793f8d2dB3ff1) on 05-Sep-2017, when the Bounty Campaign finishes. 4. Burning the unsold tokens from the Token Sale Account (0x0ebc164451dbabde43ba587b4a3327d435728e15) after the ICO is finished.    Be sure to follow us on Twitter, we'll be posting important updates and much much more: https://twitter.com/BillionaireTkn

Author: gluedog
Title: [ANN] Billionaire Token - Games on the Blockchain! 🔥 Deflationary Algorithm
Body: Billionaire Token - The world's first low supply, super-deflationary, gaming and gambling EOS Token Powered by Smart Contracts  -----  We are live on the EOS Main Net! - Go to https://BillionaireToken.com/swap to participate in the coin swap. A guide can be found at https://BillionaireToken.com/HowToSwap.pdf. - Join our telegram for live updates: https://t.me/BillionaireToken   EOS exchanges  Trading on NewDex. Trading on Chaince.   ETH exchanges - (We have migrated from Ethereum, so you will need to swap your tokens if you buy the ERC-20 variant of Billionaire Token from the following exchanges)  Trading on Cryptopia. Trading on EtherDelta. Trading on Coinexchange.     Useful links:  - -- ---- ------ --------  Play the official Become a Billionaire decentralized Raffle and Burner v2.0: https://BillionaireToken.com/Raffle - Website: https://BillionaireToken.com - Frequently Asked Questions: https://BillionaireToken.com/faq - Whitepaper: https://BillionaireToken.com/WhitePaper.pdf - Github: https://github.com/BillionaireToken - Twitter: https://Twitter.com/BillionaireTkn - Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/BillionaireTkn/ - ETH Explorer: https://etherscan.io/token/0x49aec0752e68d0282db544c677f6ba407ba17ed7 - EOS Explorer: https://bloks.io/account/billionairet - Raffle and Burner Guide: https://BillionaireToken.com/HowToRaffle.pdf - MyEtherWallet burning guide: https://BillionaireToken.com/MyEtherWalletBurn.pdf - MyEtherWallet creation guide: https://BillionaireToken.com/MyEtherWalletCreation.pdf - Telegram Group https://t.me/BillionaireToken - Hillbilly ANN: https://BitcoinTalk.org/index.php?topic=2182856 ---------------------------------  -------- ------- ----- ---- --- -- -   The Billionaire Token project   Dear crypto heads, started in August 2017, the Billionaire Token project will give each one of you the chance to become a Billionaire* and it really doesn't matter whether you are a swift hand crypto gambler or a patient long term investor. We know this may sound like one of those annoying pop-ups you were furiously closing back in the day, but we're now in 2019 and even though there are still no flying cars around, Blockchain Technology has radically changed the way we think about money, "internet money" to be more precise.  Billionaire Token (XBL) is an EOS token, designed and tailored specifically for the gamblers and the smart investors of this crazy crypto world. Most other coins or tokens have some sort of mining system, but Billionaire Token has the exact opposite: It features a deflationary mechanism that destroys 30% of the gambled tokens! In addition to this, another Smart Contract - the Burner - that works kind of like a twisted Faucet, rewarding people for burning their own coins, further increases the burning. The rarity of the coin is what provides intrinsic value to the token and differentiates it from the competition. The Raffle and Burner are playable at this very moment, but this is just the beginning since we have an up-coming Billionaire Cee-Lo DICE game and a Poker Platform that will run on the EOS Main Net.  The Billionaire Token games, unlike other popular gambling platforms, are fully decentralized - We have no house and we do not host anything on our servers (like the seed generation algorithm or any sort of game engine). Everything is as it should be - on the Blockchain. And because we do not host anything on our servers, it’s also impossible for us or any of our games to "get hacked".  Even if you're not the gambling type, we think that long-view investors will see the value of Billionaire Token. The gambling industry is one of the most profitable environments for a business nowadays and there is much the Gambling industry can learn from Crypto Currencies.  But you can't make it in the gambling industry without having a top-notch product.  So what exactly does Billionaire Token offer that is new and exciting?    Q: How is the Billionaire Hold'em poker game going to work?  A: Billionaire Hold'em will be a piece of open-source software (a game) running on the EOS Main Network. A classic Texas Hold'em Poker game with a twist - users will be using XBL tokens as the in-game currency. Security and trust have always been a problem in the online poker scene. All the big poker platforms are centralized and thus susceptible to hacks and funds being lost or games being rigged - as the centralized entities have control over the randomness of the whole card dealing and so anyone that has access to their servers could manipulate the games.  The Billionaire Hold'em poker platform will be decentralized and thus users will not be in danger of having their funds lost or the games being rigged because no single entity will have control over the outcome of the game. We will be seeding our random number generator via an EOS Smart Contract - The seed will become public knowledge once the game is over.    Q: What are the coin specifications?  A:   Q: What about the premine ? How will you prove that half will be used for bounties and advertising campaigns?  A: Half of the 8.5% XBL tokens, the bounty funds, were initially located at Ethereum address 0x23EA016b4EBA78dFC374E99b2F6793f8d2dB3ff1, no funds left there without justification. The bounty campaign has now closed as we have successfully given out all of the rewards. Everything including the Lamborghini bounty has been claimed. More information on the Bounty Campaign can be found below. The rest of the premine (4.25%) is the property of Billionaire Token team - we believe that having a stake in the project will align our interests with those of the other token holders and will increase the projects' chances of success.   Q: Ok this looks great, but why choose an EOS token? Why not a regular coin with its own blockchain?  A: Running the Billionaire Token on the EOS network instead of having our own blockchain is better suited for our goals (deploying and running the Decentralized Raffle and Burner is much simpler on a smart contract platform). Also, it makes the whole experience a lot more user-friendly. Instead of having to download a whole new wallet and the subsequent Blockchain, Billionaire Tokens will be usable with any Scatter, the most popular and easy to use EOS wallet.   Billionaire Token roadmap (2017-2019):     A coin's value is determined by supply and demand - we think that we have the perfect plan to solve both of the following issues. We hope that our plan will have the effect of increasing the value of each token:  1: Reduce supply - The deflationary mechanism takes care of this, depending on how much usage the Raffle and Burner and other games (that will also be burning coins) have, the already-low supply of ~4 million XBL will permanently be reducing. 2: Increase demand - Apart from the benefits of the speculative aspects of owning Billionaire Token, people will be able to do super fun stuff with it, like playing the weekly Become a Billionaire Raffle and the upcoming Billionaire Cee-lo Dice and Billionaire Hold'em games. And then they can always burn their own coins for more profits!  Shortly after the Token Sale, the Become a Billionaire decentralized Raffle Smart Contracts were deployed on the Ethereum Network. The code passed through a series of peer-reviews and security audits before being deployed. All information has been made public knowledge in our quest to be as transparent as possible.  Make sure to follow our Twitter and join our Telegram channel for live updates!  - -- ----  Exchanges  On the EOS Main Net, we are trading on NewDex and Chaince.  On the Ethereum Network we are trading on Cryptopia, Coinexchange and EtherDelta. Users should NOT buy from these exchanges unless they specifically want to swap. ---- -- -   Q: What are the bounties?  A: The Bounty Campaign was available for a limited time and it ended on the 27th of August 2017. So wrap it up folks, the bounty thread is nothing more than a Hall of Fame.  To find out more, please visit our bounty and rewards thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2067236    This campaign was part of our original token distribution plan. People who provided their services to us will become early adopters of Billionaire Token.   --------------------------- ------ ---- -- -  I am Gluedog, lead developer and coordinator of the Billionaire Token project. I will be here to gladly answer any of your questions.  ---  Thank you for your time, Gluedog and The Billionaire Token team because money really is everything  ---  *Everyone who owns Billionaire Tokens is considered a Billionaire.

Author: gluedog
Title: [ANN] Billionaire Token - Games on the Blockchain! 🔥 Deflationary Algorithm
Body: Thanks for the pointer. We have deleted the section about Bounties from our announcement thread and will update once we are done migrating to a new one.   Quote from: toygg on August 05, 2017, 03:39:39 AM I do not understand why should someone invest in this token. I mean come on, it is just one lucky person who will win the raffle at  the end of each week. What are the odds of u winning it... 0.000005%?!?!?!!. It is great for the winner but bad for losers(which is the majority). Kthxbye.  The chances of winning the raffle depend on how many people actually register to the raffle that week.  For example: If there are 100 tickets bought for the raffle, and you have three of those tickets - then your chance of winning is 3%.  Investing in this token, I believe, is attractive because of three main reasons:  1. Potential of an extremely small supply (10% tokens in the raffle are burned, bounty tokens will be burned on 5 September 2017 or possibly sooner, and on top of this, all of the unsold tokens from the crowdsale account will be burned after the ICO) 2. The weekly raffles! 3. The "Billionaire Hold'em" poker game!   Quote from: virasisog on August 05, 2017, 06:03:55 AM Looks a good ICO although it is new and i got an attention because of its Name "Billionaire" ,but its lack of informations thou.  I am slightly got disappointed . I want to say that a good promotion or advertisements that can boost this ICO awareness is much preferred .  I am here to answer any of your questions. We are also planning to release a Whitepaper before our Token Sale.  What would you like to know more of the Billionaire Token project?

Author: gluedog
Title: [ANN] Billionaire Token - Games on the Blockchain! 🔥 Deflationary Algorithm
Body: Hello everyone,  Just to let you know: The current token distribution model is being reworked. We believe the initial one we had in mind would be unfair for some people that do not get in the first 5 hours of the Token Sale. The new distribution model will consist of several time windows, spread out over a period of 31 days, with an equal-bonus opportunity for everyone - also, we will have a special, 24-hour long special bonus where the more people buy in that timeframe, the more tokens everyone gets at the very end!  Thank you, Gluedog

Author: gluedog
Title: [ANN] Billionaire Token - Games on the Blockchain! 🔥 Deflationary Algorithm
Body: The thing that makes Billionaire Token different is, simply put: it's made to be burned, and it's going to be fun!  1. The weekly decentralized Raffle will destroy 10% of the tokens that are sent to it. 2. The burner will destroy another 20% of the tokens that are sent to the Raffle. 3. After the Token Sale, whatever is not sold is destroyed. 4. On 05-sep-2017, or possibly sooner we will burn whatever is left in the bounty address, minus the 50k for the lambo bounty. 5. Anyone can burn their own tokens.
